application.doc: Retrieve the log file names of an existing instance

param.name: id
param.doc: Name of the instance to act on, which is a unique name that identifies the instance

method.name: GET
method.id: Retrieve log file names - Authorization Server
method.doc: To update one or more configuration entries by stanza with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP PUT command on the authorization server instances resource URI.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

representation.name: logFileNamesJsonResponse
representation.doc: Note: Response body is an array.

param.name: id
param.doc: The name of the log file

param.name: size
param.doc: The size in KB of the log file

param.name: version
param.doc: The time stamp of the log file in seconds since epoch

response.doc: There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.
File not Found, The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.
An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.
